name: Milanna
description: Milanna Leather Products Co., LTD is a high-end leather goods manufacturer founded in 2010, specializing in PU, cut-and-sew, and bag products including wallets and belts. With state-of-the-art production facilities in China and Cambodia, the company has a monthly capacity of up to one million pieces and serves top brands across Europe, America, and Asia. Milanna stands out for its strong R&D capabilities, sustainable material sourcing, and commitment to quality through ISO and GRS certifications.
shortdescription: High-end leather goods manufacturer founded in 2010, specializing in PU, cut-and-sew, and bag products.

features.title: Advanced Production Technology
features.subtitle: Automated systems and precision tools ensure consistent quality and faster output.

features.title: High Volume Capacity
features.subtitle: Three factories and 3,700+ staff enable nearly one million units monthly.

features.title: Certified Quality Assurance
features.subtitle: Products meet top global standards with ISO, GRS, and SLCP certifications.

specs.name: Monthly Production Output
specs.spec: Up to 1,000,000 pieces across all factories

specs.name: Development Teams
specs.spec: 24 working groups using OPTITEX 2D/3D pattern systems

specs.name: Lab Testing Equipment
specs.spec: 8+ machines, including shock, salt spray, and tensile testers
